item.description:
This month we celebrate Love Your Pet Day! We have lots of Fun ways to Love our pups this Sunday from 11:00am-1:00pm. There will be a squeaky toy bonanza, a Belly Rub Relay Race, & plenty of Love & Affection. So bring your Best Friend to Love Your Pet Day!! Special treat for all pets dressed in their Valentine's Best.

Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Love Your Pet Day
